# RamEx

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of RamEx is to create Ramanome object and its related basic operations

## Installation

You can install the development version of RamEx like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("testplm/RamEx")
#or
remotes::install_github("testplm/RamEx")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(RamEx)
```
